d54e3769be0c522015b784eca2af258b1c026107

https://github.com/zlib-ng/zlib-ng/releases/tag/2.2.1

We have removed the following folders from our local copy as these files are not needed for our compilation:

- zlib-ng/doc/
- zlib-ng/test/
- zlib-ng/arch/s390/self-hosted-builder/

Also apply:
- https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/commit/ecdb625035e0e3fb7c51e908713d96d2cb2080c8.patch or cherry-pick ecdb625035e0e3fb7c51e908713d96d2cb2080c8 directly.
- https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/105771/commits/d1850db0841ba80d4624df401fc89aa29ede8693.patch or cherry-pick d1850db0841ba80d4624df401fc89aa29ede8693 directly.
